data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Attachment Set
data.detailed_description:
A set of attachments that will let you accessorize behind your wildest dreams.

Summer Red Tube x 10
Mishy Tube x 10
Donut Tube x 10
Floaty Friend Lammy x 10
Floaty Friend Bobcat x 10
Floaty Friend Shining Pom x 10
Main Campus Backpack x 10
Red Backpack x 10
Angel Backpack x 10
Fairy King Costume x 10
Doggy Set x 10
Black Bunny Set x 10
True Ashen Knight Set x 10
Azure Knight Set x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
